type.description: The type of the tool. Always `mcp`.

server_label.description: A label used to identify the MCP server.

server_url.description: The URL of the MCP server to connect to.

server_description.description: An optional human-readable description of the MCP server.

headers.description: Optional HTTP headers to send when connecting to the MCP server.

allowed_tools.description: A list of MCP tool names that are allowed for this server.

require_approval.description: Controls which MCP tools require explicit user approval before execution.
